lyrics.text:
’Oku fakatou fai
Ke fakamo’oni;
Hotau laumālie, mo e
Laumālie lelei.

’Oku tau mo’ui
‘I he Laumālie
‘O hotau ‘Otua lelei
Pea angatonu.

Pea tau talia
‘Ene ngaahi fekau,
Pea muimui ma’u pē
Ki he Folofola.

Ko ‘etau feinga
‘Oku lahi taha,
Ke fakafiemālie
Ki hotau ‘Otua.

Pea tupu hake
‘I he manavahē
Mo e loto lelei lahi
‘O mā’oni’oni.
